headline: Looking at the Narrative for Tapestry After Recent Analyst Updates and Brand Momentum Shifts
summary: Tapestry stock has seen a modest revision in its consensus analyst price target, rising from $116.44 to $118.00. This uptick follows updates from both bullish and bearish analysts, who are weighing optimism about brand momentum and growth against ongoing macroeconomic challenges. Stay tuned to discover how you can stay informed about future shifts in Tapestry’s evolving investment narrative.
